creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons in honor of Lotus Stack
description: multicolored, striped shawl with braided fringe and large yarn tassels at each end; tassels are purple (light and dark), pink, blue, teal, maroon and red; shawl is in 2 panels
dimension: 65 3/4 x 39 in. (167.01 x 99.06 cm) (excluding fringe and tassels)
title: Shawl
